'''1.20.1 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.20.1-rc1''' in the launcher) is the first and only release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.20.1]], released on June 9, 2023,<ref name="article_1.20.1-rc1">{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-1-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.20.1 Release Candidate 1|June 9, 2023}}</ref> which adds a language, and fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Language]]s'''
* Added Serbian (Latin).<ref group=note>Also available for versions since [[22w42a]].</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20.1 Release Candidate 1|otherissuescount=1
|;From 1.20
|263244|The realms invitation icon that appears on the realms button in the main menu is displayed incorrectly.
|263245|Buttons in the "Add Realm" interface within the realms menu no longer render.
|263296|Game softlocks after cancelling joining a server.
|263340|Incorrect {{cd|Protochunk#setStatus}} call on chunk generate.
}}
'''Other'''
* Disk permissions-related crash.<ref name="article_1.20.1-rc1"/></onlyinclude>
